room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Source Code Escape Games in Augusta
review: Great time at a unique escape room. I have been to probably 20 escape rooms, and their Asylum is definitely in my top 3 I have done. It was creative and not just a bunch of lock and keys, but had a cool quirky fun theme with some neat little twists.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Source Code Escape Games in Augusta
review: Such a fun place! Got to help cure the haunting in the asylum, and then threw axes for a bit. Staff was friendly and great, can't wait to come back for their future events.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Source Code Escape Games in Augusta
review: Had an amazing time! Done quite a few different ones and this is definitely one of my favorites. They have plenty of little intricacies that immerse you in the game. Will definitely be back when the next one opens!

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Source Code Escape Games in Augusta
review: I have done a handful of escape rooms and this one is by far my favorite. I can't wait for the new puzzle to open!
